channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed’s Williams says tariffs are pushing up inflation, and he expects even higher prices in coming months

item.title: BlackRock’s stock rallies as Wall Street shrugs off a massive client redemption
item.description: BlackRock’s stock bounced higher Wednesday as Wall Street brushed off any concerns over a large redemption by a client in Asia, and as CEO Larry Fink ...

item.title: Arm’s stock is rising as analysts say an intriguing move could be on the horizon

item.title: United Airlines just tweaked its profit outlook for the year. It’s still not enough for the stock.
item.description: The revision comes amid ‘less geopolitical and macroeconomic uncertainty,’ United says.

item.title: How Wall Street’s most hated stocks have performed against tariffs — and the smart money
item.description: An update on the hypothetical ‘Pariah Capital’ portfolio so far this year.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
